step_feedback.feedback: Good job on the first step! You performed the shoulder blade squeeze and circular motion well. Remember to breathe deeply, inhaling as you pull your shoulders back.
In step 2, focus on maintaining a smoother, more controlled circular motion.  Try to keep your elbows closer to your body and avoid unnecessary wrist movement.

Step 3 shows some inconsistency.  Concentrate on completing the full four repetitions with consistent, controlled movements.  Try to keep your shoulders relaxed and avoid tension in your neck or upper back.

exercise_summary: You did a good job attempting the shoulder rolls exercise.  Focus on maintaining a smooth, controlled circular motion throughout all four repetitions, keeping your elbows close to your body and minimizing wrist movement. Remember to breathe deeply while performing the exercise.
